subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When the Oakland Athletics ended spring training, Jack Cust was a minor leaguer for San Diego, Chad Gaudin was an extra arm in the bullpen and Santiago Casilla was trying to find himself in Sacramento, Oakland’s Class AAA affiliate.
snippet: When the Oakland Athletics ended spring training, Jack Cust was a minor leaguer for San Diego, Chad Gaudin was an extra arm in the bullpen and Santiago Casilla was trying to find himself in Sacramento, Oakland’s Class AAA affiliate.
